A Value proposition

Join the Order of New Babylon and become part of a community of like-minded individuals who are passionate about utilizing AI to build new ecosystems and generate income. Our monthly subscription of $49 and entrance fee of $99 gives you access to a wealth of resources and support, including expert mentorship, networking opportunities, and exclusive access to cutting-edge AI technologies. With a focus on practical applications and innovation, the Order of New Babylon is the perfect community for anyone looking to take their AI knowledge and skills to the next level.

Success stories

Abdul rehman ( Creative Director of RISS )

My experience of "New Babylon Order" usage was awesome, we used it for creating content in our company social media. First guys from the community showed me how to create detailed images about my brand and than supported me with Ai that created captions for all of them. The number of alternative variants was unbelivable and the content had high quality. So I received an economy around $20K per month. Strongly recommend to try.
